title: Elliott takes $1 billion stake at Hyundai
text:
Elliott takes $1 billion stake at Hyundai 12:35pm BST - 01:11 
A unit of U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management reveals that it holds more than $1 billion worth of shares in key affiliates of South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group and calls for more rapid reform of the auto giant’s governance. Grace Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A unit of U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management reveals that it holds more than $1 billion worth of shares in key affiliates of South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group and calls for more rapid reform of the auto giant’s governance. Grace Lee reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2H8bBIs
